    • Constructor Detail

      • Signature

        protected Signature(boolean isWeak,
                    long rawPtr)

      • Signature

        public Signature(@Nonnull
                 String name,
                 @Nonnull
                 String email,
                 @Nonnull
                 OffsetDateTime time)
        Create a new action signature.

        Note: angle brackets ('<' and '>') characters are not allowed to be used in either the `name` or the `email` parameter.

        Parameters:
        name - name of the person
        email - email of the person
        time - time (in seconds from epoch) when the action happened
        Throws:
        GitException - git errors

      • Signature

        public Signature(@Nonnull
                 String name,
                 @Nonnull
                 String email,
                 long epocSecs,
                 int offsetMinutes)

      • now

        @Nonnull
public static Signature now(@Nonnull
                                     String name,
                                     @Nonnull
                                     String email)
        Create a new action signature with a timestamp of 'now'.

        Call `git_signature_free()` to free the data.

        Parameters:
        name - name of the person
        email - email of the person
        Returns:
        out new signature
        Throws:
        GitException - git errors

      • getDefault

        @Nonnull
public static Optional<Signature> getDefault(@Nonnull
                                                      Repository repo)
        Create a new action signature with default user and now timestamp.

        This looks up the user.name and user.email from the configuration and uses the current time as the timestamp, and creates a new signature based on that information. It will return GIT_ENOTFOUND if either the user.name or user.email are not set.

        Parameters:
        repo - repository pointer
        Returns:
        new signature or empty if config is missing
        Throws:
        GitException - git errors

      • fromBuffer

        @Nonnull
public static Signature fromBuffer(@Nonnull
                                            String buf)
        Create a new signature by parsing the given buffer, which is expected to be in the format "Real Name timestamp tzoffset", where `timestamp` is the number of seconds since the Unix epoch and `tzoffset` is the timezone offset in `hhmm` format (note the lack of a colon separator).
        Parameters:
        buf - signature string
        Returns:
        out new signature
        Throws:
        GitException - git errors

      • dup

        public static Signature dup(@Nonnull
                            Signature sig)
        Create a copy of an existing signature. All internal strings are also duplicated.

        Call `git_signature_free()` to free the data.

        Parameters:
        sig - signature to duplicate
        Returns:
        copy of the signature
        Throws:
        GitException - git error
